name: zuasoko-app
description: Zuasoko Agricultural Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:frontend && echo 'Deployment package ready in frontend/dist/'
scripts.vercel:build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel:install: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/api && npm install
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: Zuasoko Team
